about_the_game:
★ Fallen Saint is a story in the series of The Queen’s Glory.

◆Featured Systems

◇Full CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.

◇Pressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

◆ Story

The Saint Viola arrived in the city to see the great disparity between the rich and the poor. She felt compassion for the poor people, and wanted to use the knowledge she learnt at the Holy Guides to save them through missionary work, but found a latent religion active here instead.

"Viola...Viola..." She kept hearing calls from the void as she explored...

As the story progressed, Viola continued to explore the various regions. She gradually discovered the mysterious organisation behind it, leading Viola step by step into the abyss and gradually uncovering its crazy truth...

Viola fell into the arms of the evil god without realising it. After countless hardships and illusions, Viola, no longer able to distinguish between reality and illusion, prayed to the evil god and walked into the abyss of depravity.

◆Gameplay Instructions

The game is a turn-based exploratory AVG in which the player takes on the role of the Saint Viola and enters a missionary in the medieval city of Triumphust. You will meet a variety of people in the “Capital”, the “Sanctuary”, the “Inner City”, the “Remnant”, and the “Slum”.

Through commands such as "Chat", "Request", "Explore", "Pray", "Sermon", and "Help", etc., the player can explore and communicate with the locals.
And through commands such as "Invite", "Serve", "Intercourse" and "Ritual", the player can command Viola to have sex.

As commands are executed, the player will enter four endings, “Norman Ending”, “Saint Ending”, “Fallen Ending” and “Descent Ending”, depending on the values or story line.

◆ Game Features

◇ 30 basic CGs, including more than 120 differentials
◇ Game text: 110,000
◇ A medieval style, turn-based simulation game.
◇ Game endings: 4 types

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Extra Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug abuse, self-harm, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
